title: Were 20,000 Fake IDs Seized at Chicago Airport Part of a Voter-Fraud Scheme?
subtitle: Fake driver’s licenses grabbed by customs officials since early 2020 became subjects of voting-related rumors.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: Thousands of fake driver’s licenses smuggled from China and Hong Kong and seized in Chicago’s O’Hare Airport since early 2020 were linked to voter-fraud operations, and could produce millions of illegally cast votes in the November 2020 U.S. general election.
